abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation acknowledges that its agents violated guidelines when investigating plots to damage Keystone XL pipeline in 2013 by accessing information about environmental advocates despite lacking authorization.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Bureau of Investigation violated its own guidelines in 2013 when it investigated environmental advocates who opposed the Keystone XL pipeline, the F.B.I. said.

headline.main: F.B.I. Says It Broke Its Rules in Inquiry of Keystone Pipeline Opponents
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Says It Broke Its Rules in Inquiry

snippet: The Federal Bureau of Investigation violated its own guidelines in 2013 when it investigated environmental advocates who opposed the Keystone XL pipeline, the F.B.I. said.
